title: Bricks in Three Parts Bearing the Cartouche of Menkhepere-Penedjen
period: New Kingdom or Third Intermediate Period
description:
A: Brown mud brick with a high straw content, inscribed, on one side, for the High Priest of Amun, Menkheperre and his wife (?) Esemkhebe. The hieroglyphs if the stamped impression appear in raised relief.
B: Brick which is similar to A but which is broken in two. The inscription is illegible. 
Condition:
A: Almost cracked in two across the center; ends much chipped; otherwise good. 
B: Broken into two pieces; much chipped.

museum_location.name: This item is not on view
